## makeDict() function

Turns a map or dict into a dict

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function makeDict<TVal>(map: Optional<MapLike<TVal>>): Dict<TVal>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  map | <code>Optional&lt;MapLike&lt;TVal&gt;&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
